path: artifacts/VELOREX Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.VELOREX: contracts/VELOREX Full Smart Contract Security Audit/VELOREX

findings.title: Out of Gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is long.

findings.title: Owner Privileges
findings.description: The owner has various privileged actions that can impact the contract's behavior and economics.
